inclusion.criterion: diagnosis for appendicitis undergoing appendectomy during the same admission
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting.
